item.title: Welcome to Orbital Coding
item.description: Or should I say welcome again ? Switching to Hugo Orbital Coding now uses Hugo, a static site generator. Yes, WordPress is a great content management system, but it require a database and active server side code. Running code on the server alongside a database require more resources while increasing the attack surface.
